[
    Expression {
        expression: Closure(
            Closure {
                start: Span(
                    3,
                    1,
                ),
                end: Span(
                    5,
                    1,
                ),
                attributes: [],
                parameters: FunctionParameterList {
                    start: Span(
                        3,
                        10,
                    ),
                    end: Span(
                        3,
                        11,
                    ),
                    members: [],
                },
                return_ty: None,
                uses: [],
                by_ref: false,
                body: [
                    If {
                        condition: Variable(
                            SimpleVariable(
                                SimpleVariable {
                                    span: Span(
                                        4,
                                        9,
                                    ),
                                    name: "foo",
                                },
                            ),
                        ),
                        then: [
                            Expression {
                                expression: Variable(
                                    SimpleVariable(
                                        SimpleVariable {
                                            span: Span(
                                                4,
                                                15,
                                            ),
                                            name: "bar",
                                        },
                                    ),
                                ),
                                end: Span(
                                    4,
                                    19,
                                ),
                            },
                        ],
                        else_ifs: [],
                        else: None,
                    },
                ],
                static: false,
            },
        ),
        end: Span(
            5,
            2,
        ),
    },
]
